channel.title: How to empty trash on Whonix and Linux? Sorry dumb question
channel.description: I apologize in advance for this silly question but I am really stuck. I am new to Linux Ubuntu as well as Whonix. I can't figure out how to empty the trash on either one of these. I can move items to the trash and view what is in the trash can but cannot empty what is inside? I have searched this and have yet to find proper instructions that have led me to emptying the trash. This probably takes the gold for dumb questions, I am sorry but any help would be appreciated.

item.title: How to empty trash on Whonix and Linux? Sorry dumb question

item.description:
PLEASE IGNORE I JUST FIGURED IT OUT. I AM A GIANT IDIOT!!

SORRY TO WASTE YOUR TIME
